attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I as part of the electorate wish tony blair to resign immediately as he is a liar over why we went in to iraq, and his idea to introduce road tolls will result in more expensive consumer goods, and demand for higher wages. just a stupid idea. he is not fit to be prime minister.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
